mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `zx_risk`.`sta_user_baseinfo` ( `nid`, `age`, `in_time`, `duration`, `cnt_num`, `cnt_register_num`, `opt_calls_register_num`, `opt_short_num`, `opt_avg_fee`, `user_device_num`, `user_device_used_num`, `add_time`, `update_time` ) VALUES ( #{nid}, #{age},#{inTime}, #{duration}, #{cntNum}, #{cntRegisterNum}, #{optCallsRegisterNum},#{optShortNum}, #{optAvgFee}, #{userDeviceNum}, #{userDeviceUsedNum}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE())
on duplicate key update age = VALUES(age), in_time = VALUES(in_time), duration = VALUES(duration), cnt_num = VALUES(cnt_num), cnt_register_num = VALUES(cnt_register_num), opt_calls_register_num = VALUES(opt_calls_register_num), opt_short_num = VALUES(opt_short_num), opt_avg_fee = VALUES(opt_avg_fee), user_device_num = VALUES(user_device_num), user_device_used_num = VALUES(user_device_used_num),update_time=SYSDATE()
